definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, commonly associated with individuals in various fields such as engineering, politics, and academia. Notably, it is the name of James Wilkinson, an American military officer and politician in the late 18th and early 19th centuries.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英语的姓氏，常与工程、政治和学术等领域的个人相关联。著名人物包括18世纪末至19世纪初的美国军事将领和政治家詹姆斯·威尔金森。
definitions.example_en: Dr. Wilkinson presented her groundbreaking research on renewable energy at the international conference.
definitions.example_cn: 威尔金森博士在国际会议上展示了她在可再生能源领域的开创性研究。

definitions.explanation_en: A brand or product name derived from the surname, such as the Wilkinson Sword, a well-known British manufacturer of razors and blades.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自该姓氏的品牌或产品名称，例如著名的英国剃须刀和刀片制造商威尔金森剑（Wilkinson Sword）。
definitions.example_en: He switched to Wilkinson Sword blades after his old razor became dull.
definitions.example_cn: 他的旧剃须刀变钝后，换成了威尔金森剑的刀片。

comparison.analysis: “Surname”（姓氏）是通用术语，泛指家族传承的姓，而 “Wilkinson” 是一个具体的姓氏实例。前者是类别，后者是成员。
“Brand”（品牌）指商业标识或产品系列，而 “Wilkinson” 本身是姓氏，仅在特定语境下（如 Wilkinson Sword）才成为品牌。二者有交集但本质不同：一个是语言学概念，一个是市场营销概念。
“Proper noun”（专有名词）是语法类别，包括人名、地名、品牌等；“Wilkinson” 属于专有名词的一种，即人名姓氏。因此，Wilkinson 是 proper noun 的子集，而非同义词。
